name: A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to Thor's Hammer
summary:
《寻找雷神锤子路上发生的趣事》是《美国队长》蓝光碟和DVD碟附带的短片。 
　　《钢铁侠2》结尾Agent Coulson找到了雷神之锤，他在寻找锤子的路上，发生了什么？Coulson探员在超市买多纳圈时遇到了抢劫犯，看神盾局特工如何智斗歹徒。 
　　Captain America: The First Avenger will be released on DVD/Blu-ray on October 25, featuring the Marvel One-Shot “A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to Thor’s Hammer. 
　　The new One-Shot is meant to bridge Iron Man 2 and Thor. The slickly directed short follows Agent Coulson (Clark Gregg) as he stops at a convenience store for some donuts, when two armed men burst in and try to rob the place. See how the S.H.I.E.L.D. agent takes care of the situation after the jump.
